Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Syndrome/Temporomandibular Joint Dysfunction Syndrome
Record.Description: A symptom complex consisting of pain, muscle tenderness, clicking in the joint, and limitation or alteration of mandibular movement. The symptoms are subjective and manifested primarily in the masticatory muscles rather than the temporomandibular joint itself. Etiologic factors are uncertain but include occlusal dysharmony and psychophysiologic factors.
